sense.def: Pathological Condition of li ji 痢疾 , free-flux illness, brought forth by excessive consumption of wine with an accumulation of heat poison. It is often accompanied by high fever and a discharge of blood. Tai ping hui min he ji Recipe book. Northern Song, ju fang 1107~1110. 太平惠民和劑局方 6: 腸風黑散，治榮衛氣虛，…大便鮮血，臍 腹疼痛，裏急後重，或肛門脫出，或久患酒痢 , “Black powder for intestinal wind cures camp and guardian qi depletion, … Stools with fresh blood. Pain in the region of the navel and abdomen. An inner feeling of urgency and a feeling of heavy pressure at the behind. In some cases with prolapse of the rectum, in some cases with a prolonged suffering of wine free-flux illness ”.
